title: League client constantly disconnecting
body: The league client has been disconnecting constantly for the past 10 minutes and it is also happening to everyone else from NA

replies.body:
When you say it's happening to everyone else, what do you mean?  Connection issues are pretty common for League since it's always online, but if there's something going down we definitely want to know.  As a first step, make sure to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities.  Starting there is the most important framework before moving forward.

If anyone is having a sudden issue like this, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to the NA game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for 5 minutes then post your logs as well as what ISP you're using.  This will help give us a better overview of how you're routing to us!

This wasn't my internet, I was in a call with multiple people and all of them complained about the same thing and there were tons of posts on the forums about the exact same thing. It was fixed a while after though and hasnt happened today.

read the support thread.. many people are getting the bug that says you're offline and can't connect. past 3-4 days.
